alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 13 at 1:33PM MDT until March 15 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts 60 to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 3 PM MDT Tuesday through 3 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing snow is expected in open and exposed areas where snowpack exists, mainly around Jeffrey City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts are likely to occur Tuesday evening until mid-morning Wednesday. Local gusts to near 70 mph are possible on Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
